title: Is the new way of order/ chaos pass worth it (new nightbringer yasuo and dawnbringer riven)
body:
What is this Event?
If you are unaware  of the new Nightbringer and dawnbringer skins, they have come with a new hextech crafting system that is very similar to the previous project update, FOR A LIMITED TIME. you are able to use Tokens obtained from the quest system with requires you to perform a simple quest from killing 10 players to obtaining a certain amount of victories, with these tokens you can get several items that are limited and may catch your eye. and of course there are the new skins and the new ward skin. 

How do you obtain these items?
You can Purchase the {{champion:157}} {{champion:92}} Nightbringer yasuo and Dawnbringer Riven for normal Legendary prices (1820RP) or you can unbox them. while everything else requires either the way of order pass or the tokens. The Special ward skins are exclusive to the way of the order/ chaos pass. While there is a new border for both of the champ skins, the special chest type (orb of order/ chaos) , Icons, key fragments and champion shards only accessible through the new crafting  for the prices below. there is also an exclusive item for the event called the Daybreak/ Nightfall icon Event emote with only has a limited use so i wouldn't waste 100 Tokens for it 

Prices for new crafting items!
#Orb of Order / chaos = 140 Tokens
#Border = 280 Tokens
#Mystery champ shard = 100 Tokens
#Icon = 80 Tokens
# Keyfrag = 40 tokens

What should you buy?
After doing the math the new "Way of Order/Chaos passes" is almost worth the price
provides 1 chest and key (200RP)
Orb of order (essentially a chest so its worth 200RP)
Special  ward (exclusive to the chest)  = 640RP
100x Tokens, (1 token = 2.1RP) 1x 100 = 210 RP
In total costs  = 1250RP while the actual price = 1300RP. For what i recommend is if you want the exclusive items from this package (EG the ward and the tokens_ then i would recommend. but if you're not interested in the ward or the tokens then i would not suggest as the primary cost for this bundle is the ward. so if yo dont like it. don't buy the package

xD. I apologize for any harm I have caused to your  poor little Poro body:P
Can I buy both passes? Lol

I think I can agree that if you don't like the ward it's probably not worth the price tag.
However my real question about these passes is the missions.

One part of the FAQ states:
"Most of the missions exclusive to these passes require playing as Yasuo or Riven."

However later on in the FAQ they list out the special missions of each pass. And just going off the text, it would seem only 1 mission from each pass requires you to literally play that champion. 

So is that true? Or is it just bad wording and ALL missions in the passes require you to play as it's respective champion?

I ask because I really would like the wards, but I do not play either Yasuo or Riven. So I feel that if I'm unable to complete the missions then why bother with the pass? :(
